scripts.requirements: rustup component add rust-src && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo install wasm-pack typeshare-cli
scripts.wasm:build: CARGO_TARGET_WASM32_UNKNOWN_UNKNOWN_RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+bulk-memory,+simd128' wasm-pack build ../rusty_renju_wasm --release --target web --out-name rusty_renju_wasm --out-dir ../mintaka_webui/src/wasm/pkg/rusty_renju_wasm -- -Z build-std=std,panic_abort
scripts.wasm-worker:build: CARGO_TARGET_WASM32_UNKNOWN_UNKNOWN_RUSTFLAGS='-C target-feature=+atomics,+bulk-memory,+mutable-globals,+simd128 -C link-arg=--import-memory -C link-arg=--shared-memory -C link-arg=--export=__wasm_init_tls -C link-arg=--export=__tls_base -C link-arg=--export=__tls_size -C link-arg=--export=__tls_align -C link-arg=--initial-memory=16777216 -C link-arg=--max-memory=4294967296' wasm-pack build ../mintaka_wasm --release --target web --out-name mintaka_wasm --out-dir ../mintaka_webui/src/wasm/pkg/mintaka_wasm -- -Z build-std=std,panic_abort
scripts.wasm:package: pnpm run typeshare:build && pnpm run wasm:build && pnpm run wasm-worker:build
scripts.build: pnpm run wasm:package && pnpm run typecheck && vite build
